title: (x) Elvis Costello, similar to OL Franklin Extra Bold - H&FJ Knockout {Marc O}
content:
I need help identifying a typeface. I put it through WhatTheFont and it closely matches [OL Franklin Extra Bold Regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824065157/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ortizlopez/olfranklin/extra-bold-regular/), but it's not quite right. For one thing the capital Cs do not match. I am thinking it is either a different cut of Franklin Extra Bold or the designer did some tweaking. Since this is a web graphic I am thinking the first option is the more likely one.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [elviscostello.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824065157/http:/typophile.com/files/elviscostello.jpg) | 45.9 KB |
author: thetophus

comments.content:
H&FJ's Knockout, methinks.

The 93 Ultimate Heavyweight, to be exact:

[http://www.typography.com/catalog/knockout/testdriver/ko93.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824065157/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/knockout/testdriver/ko93.html "http://www.typography.com/catalog/knockout/testdriver/ko93.html")
I do believe you are correct, Marcox. Wow, that was fast!
